title: Enable selectively the "Override iPod Music" player option from code

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • We want to allow music from other apps if the user has the music turned off in our game and Unity API does not give access to "Override iPod Music".

sections.title: Cause
content: • "Override iPod Music" is not accessible from code.
